il.ac.hit.taxitogo.model.user

Interface IUserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLUserDAO

    public interface IUserDAO

    An Interface class for user DAO purpose.

    Version:
    22.01.2015
    Author:
    Victor Zhinzherov, Lior Kizer, Ariel Yusupov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(User userToAdd)
      This method is used to add a new user into the database.
      void deleteUser(java.lang.String usernameToDelete)
      This method is used to delete the user from the database.
      boolean isUserExist(User userToCheck)
      This method is a boolean method that used when the user is trying to connect as an admin.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        void addUser(User userToAdd)
      throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to add a new user into the database.

        Parameters:
        userToAdd - User - User object
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • isUserExist

        boolean isUserExist(User userToCheck)
             throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is a boolean method that used when the user is trying to connect as an admin. It checks if a certain user exist in the database and if the given password matches the user's encrypted password that is stored inside the database

        Parameters:
        userToCheck - - User object
        Returns:
        boolean True if user is exist inside the database and the given password match the encrypted password that is stored inside the database. False if it's otherwise.
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(java.lang.String usernameToDelete)
         throws TaxiToGoException

        This method is used to delete the user from the database.

        Parameters:
        usernameToDelete - String - User name
        Throws:
        TaxiToGoException - If there was a problem connecting the database
